sentences.sContent: In addition, they will also misguide the innocent, which becomes a vicious circle.
sentences.sCn: 此外，他们将误导那些思想单纯的人，这将导致一个恶心循环。

sentences.sContent: The other type of behavior is non-deceptive information misguide or incompleteness of information, namely, significant omission of information disclosure.
sentences.sCn: 另一种行为是非欺骗性的误导或者信息不充分, 即信息披露的重大遗露.

sentences.sContent: One sort of behavior is incomplete or distorted information disclosure mentioned by Williamson, especially purposeful misguide, distortion, concealment and confusion, etc.
sentences.sCn: 第一种行为是威廉森提出的不完全或者扭曲的信息披露, 特别是故意误导, 扭曲和隐藏相关信息以及制造疑惑等等.

trans.tranOther: to guide or direct wrongly or badly
